text: Joseph Nicholas Linsalata (June 17, 1916 - January 25, 2000) was a professional baseball player and umpire. ==Career== From 1938 to 1940, he caught in the minor leagues with the Sydney Steel Citians and the Bluefield Blue-Grays.Baseball-Reference (Minors) He umpired 166 American League games in , 40 of them behind the plate.Retrosheet ==Death== Linsalata died in Hollywood, Florida in 2000. ==References== Category:1916 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Sydney Steel Citians players Category:Bluefield Blue-Grays players Category:Major League Baseball umpires Category:Sportspeople from New York (state)
title: Joe Linsalata
